## Installation

You can install the development version of pcdid from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("adamwang15/pcdid")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(pcdid)

# replicates Chan, M. K., & Kwok, S. S. (2022)
result <- pcdid(
  lncase ~ treated + treated_post + afdcben + unemp + empratio + mon_d2 + mon_d3 + mon_d4,
  index = c("state", "trend"),
  data = welfare,
  alpha = TRUE
)

# mean-group estimates
result$mg
```
